item.title: PlayStation Plus for PS Vita launch line-up
item.description:
Updated 11/20/2012 with PlayStation Network prices.

On November 19th PlayStation Plus members will get access to free PlayStation Vita games, as part of the Instant Game Collection benefit.

The question is, if you’ve been sitting around waiting to pick up a PlayStation Vita, is now the perfect time to do so? If the question then becomes, how much am I saving by getting these games for free, keep reading.

The breakdown

Here are the games, and current prices, if you were to buy these:

  • Uncharted: Golden Abyss
    • Amazon: $39.99/$34.32 / 4+ stars
    • PlayStation Network: $44.99
  • Gravity Rush
    • Amazon: $39.99/$34.00 / 5 stars
    • PlayStation Network: $35.99
  • wipEout 2048
    • Amazon: $19.99/$19.00 / 4+ stars
    • PlayStation Network: $35.99
  • Jet Set Radio
    • Amazon: n/a
    • PlayStation Network: $9.99
  • Final Fantasy Tactics: The War of the Lions
    • Amazon: $9.99
    • PlayStation Network: $9.99
  • Tales From Space: Mutant Blobs Attack!
    • Amazon: n/a
    • PlayStation Network: $7.99

Given Amazon’s pricing, this will save you approximately $70 off of retail.

If purchasing from the PlayStation Network, you’d save over $140.
